creditline: Gift of the Dr. Ira and Maureen Adelman Collection
description: double snuff bottle--two disc-shaped bottles affixed together; blue ground; each bottle has a dragon on each side--yellow, grey, and two green dragons; flames and clouds on sides, top, and top of stoppers; water at bottom; one stopper has in ivory spoon
title: Double snuff bottle with dragon designs
